rev.diff:
Line 6: Line 6:
A mixtape, which usually reflects the musical tastes of its compiler, can range from a casually selected list of favorite songs, to a [[conceptual]] mix of songs linked by a [[Theme (literature)|theme]] or mood, to a highly personal statement tailored to the tape's intended recipient. Essayist [[Geoffrey O'Brien]] has called the personal mixtape "the most widely practiced [[United States of America|American]] art form",<ref name="pooter">{{cite web| url=http://www.events-in-music.com/burnlist-mix-tapes.html| title=BurnLists: The Digital "Mix Tape" Comes Of Age| first=Michael| last=Resnick| year=2006| accessdate=2007-01-15}}</ref> and many{{Who|date=June 2010}} mixtape enthusiasts believe that by carefully selecting and ordering the tracks in a mix, an [[art]]istic statement can be created that is greater than the sum of its individual songs, much as an [[album]] of [[pop music]] in the post-[[The Beatles|Beatles]] era can be considered as something more than a collection of singles.
A mixtape, which usually reflects the musical tastes of its compiler, can range from a casually selected list of favorite songs, to a [[conceptual]] mix of songs linked by a [[Theme (literature)|theme]] or mood, to a highly personal statement tailored to the tape's intended recipient. Essayist [[Geoffrey O'Brien]] has called the personal mixtape "the most widely practiced [[United States of America|American]] art form",<ref name="pooter">{{cite web| url=http://www.events-in-music.com/burnlist-mix-tapes.html| title=BurnLists: The Digital "Mix Tape" Comes Of Age| first=Michael| last=Resnick| year=2006| accessdate=2007-01-15}}</ref> and many{{Who|date=June 2010}} mixtape enthusiasts believe that by carefully selecting and ordering the tracks in a mix, an [[art]]istic statement can be created that is greater than the sum of its individual songs, much as an [[album]] of [[pop music]] in the post-[[The Beatles|Beatles]] era can be considered as something more than a collection of singles.
â
With the advent of affordable, consumer-level [[digital audio]], creating and distributing mixes in the form of [[compact disc]] or [[MP3]] [[playlist]]s has become the contemporary method of choice, but the term ''mixtape'' is still mistakenly used, for mixes in different media (for example, [[CD]], [[MP3]], [[MiniDisc]], [[audio cassette]] [[8-track tape|8 track]]).
+
With the advent of affordable, consumer-level [[digital audio]], creating and distributing mixes in the form of [[compact disc]] or [[MP3]] [[playlist]]s has become the contemporary method of choice, but the term ''mixtape'' is still commonly used, even for mixes in different media (for example, [[CD]], [[MP3]], [[MiniDisc]], [[audio cassette]] [[8-track tape|8 track]]).{{Citation needed|date=January 2010}} [[Video mixtape]]s have emerged as well.
  +
